<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)OS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a0f90ad570f71349466844ee9f2d06cd1">tell</a>() - Pos, e = <a href="#a150c0fc704c3322a038de77fa5ff4e7b">MAX&#95;LINE&#95;LEN</a> - Suffix.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a5db9240c74644c67759dd0f901fc3c7d">size</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">         i &lt; e; ++i)</Highlight></CodeLine>
